sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { onSubmit(loginForm: NgForm) { if (!loginForm.valid) { return; } console.log(loginForm.value); } onClear(loginForm: NgForm) { loginForm.reset(); } }
